greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Lengths of successive runs in A303599.
comment: Created as part of a study to try to show that A252867 is a permutation, and, more specifically, to understand terms 6171 - 7025 of A252867 (see the graph of that sequence). This "brick" in the graph of A252867 corresponds to the exceptionally large term a(831) = 1824 of the current sequence.
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5026
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 31 2018
